originalText.text: If I can give Sandy 100000 more stars I would. 5 stars doesn’t do justice what an amazing soul Sandy is. She has completely changed my life. I went to Sandy for multiple things and by the time we finished our sessions, I couldn’t believe how far I’ve come and I was secretly sad to be parting ways for now. Who would have thought I’d be able to take control of my panic attacks and who would have thought I would enjoy my flights?! Sandy’s energy and personality just radiates. Truly felt so heard, safe and comfortable with her. I thank G-d for putting Sandy in my path and feel so lucky to have met someone so wonderful. There’s not a someone in my life who doesn’t know about Sandy and my love for her. 1000000/10000000 recommend! Truly life changing!!

originalText.text:
Before my first experience with Sandy Ames, I was in therapy for thirteen years with spotty results and ineffective medication. My mind and body were out of wack; I was overweight and severely depressed; my anxiety kept me indoors and unable to sleep at night. I also experienced physical pain, and my addictions were out of control. For years, something kept nagging me (in the back of my head) that "I" was the actual cause of all the mishaps in my life, and I decided to try hypnotherapy.
With no expectations and nothing to lose, I attended my first secession. I loved Sandy immediately. She is welcoming, kind, funny, and professional. Additionally, she shares candid and impactful stories, a strategic component of hypnotherapy. But the most astonishing element of the whole process is how immediate and natural the results feel. Areas of my life that I struggled with for years were no longer a part of my daily life. Then the next thing I knew, they were out of my life completely.
Miraculously I stand here today, having gained control and focus over various areas of my life. It is wild; I am happier now, my addictions have subsided, I lost weight, and so much more. Although I was apprehensive, Sandy introduced the importance of meditation. Now, I practice it daily through hypnotherapy mediations (MP3s) on the Sandy Ames website (SANDY AMES HYPNOTHERAPY CLINIC); they are incredibly worthwhile to check out.

Thank you, Sandy!

originalText.text: My sessions with Sandy were the most effective therapy of my life. She had an astonishing ability to quickly and accurately identify the issues at the core of my problem. Every week I was given new tools that helped me change my behaviors. The hypnosis was a relaxing and fulfilling experience that reinforced the most important insights uncovered each week. Sandy is so caring and so kind, but most importantly, seriously committed to helping create positive change. Thank you Sandy!

originalText.text:
I cannot give enough praise to Sandy Ames.

I am in Europe and I had an online hypnotherapy session with Sandy who was in NY.
Sandy made absoulutely sure that I was under hypnosis. I have so many, many positive side benefits from that one session, even though it has been months!

I don't know where to start. My previously asymetrical smile ( since childhood and now I am 58) is now symetrical. It never bothered me much to have an asymmetrical smile, and that is not what I came for but my point is, the WHOLE ME is so much more balancanced and aligned that it shows on my outside. Also, and this is very important, even though I could only afford one session, it gave me so, so much AND ALL recorded hypnosis, weather from Sandy Ames or from other hypnotists work so, so much better now.

Thank you Sandy, and thank you for being so aligned and authentic.

originalText.text:
I went to Sandy for help with a specific issue, and walked away with so much more.

Over the course of four weeks, Sandy not only helped me to achieve my initial goals, but also worked with me to develop a broader framework for dealing with stress, engaging in my relationships and, most importantly, understanding and taking care of myself.

In doing so, she has transformed my ability to manage my traps of anxiety and perfectionism. I feel more empowered, in control and "myself" than I can remember. I now realise just how much anxiety and burnout was impacting on every aspect of my life.

Thanks to my work with Sandy I am so much better able to understand, appreciate, and enjoy my friends, family and myself. Without a doubt, seeing Sandy was one of the best decisions I have ever made!
